name: prism-armor
effect:
Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.

This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
